title: Plan to Trap the Golden Thigh - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Black Belly   Calm Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Determined Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Family Conflict   Handsome Male Lead   Kidnappings   Modern Day   Murders   Near-Death Experience   Past Plays a Big Role   Past Trauma   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Revenge   Secret Crush   Smart Couple   Suicides   Tragic Past   Tsundere   Wealthy Characters   Yandere
author: 水破长空
description:
Ji Naitang has been paying attention to Cen Muqi for twelve years. This crush has always been hidden in his heart. When he couldn’t hide it anymore, he sent himself to Cen Muqi, pretended to be a pig to eat a tiger, and started his plan to capture him.

Ji Naitang: I’m not good-looking. You just take pictures that make me look good.

Cen Muqi: It’s a fact that it’s very important to have a boyfriend who knows how to take pictures.

Ji Naitang: But you’re not my boyfriend ~

Cen Muqi: Then can I apply?

Ji Naitang: Apply for what?

Cen Muqi: Apply to be your……>
